title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message:

error - “An error occurred loading the update “

Consistently failing OS update,
I have tried with high speed internet 
Tried with new ssd

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message: Try to install an older macOS version; directly from USB.

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message:
Unfortunately the restore option is failing when I try from an external SSD. 
Please find the error details attached in the link.
Also tried to install macos X (using Ctrl+R) I got the same error again.

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message: Try with LAN connection, instead of WiFi...

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message: Tried LAN, but That doesn't help. For the time being, I have used a pre-loaded internal SSD But a bit afraid that customer will face the same problem when they get the upgrade option.

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message:
I have tried to upgrade the os from preloaded bigsur to Montero while upgrading it's stopped 
" Installation can not proceed because the installer is damaged"
What does it mean ?

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message:
Does the client really need Monterey?
It is known for getting strange issues; not recommended for old machines.

Try inserting an SSD upgraded to Monterey on other machine.

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message: Please note that the issue is not just for Monterey, It's failing to load any OS including old OS's

title: A1398 , Problem while loading OS update
message:
"I have used a pre-loaded internal SSD
----------------------------------------------
I have tried to upgrade the os from preloaded bigsur to Montero"
I was thinking you've already booted an old macOS.
If yes, explain to the client and tell him to keep actual version.
